text: Spiders in the genus Tigrosa were formerly included in the genus Hogna, and before that to the genus Lycosa. As people who study spiders make more progress they divide things in new ways. Among the species included in this genus are: *T. annexa *T. aspersa *T. grandis *T. helluo *T. georgicola ==References== * Brady, A.R. 2012: Nearctic species of the new genus Tigrosa (Araneae: Lycosidae). Journal of arachnology, 40(2): 182-208. ISSN 0161-8202 Category:Lycosidae
title: Tigrosa
